english.segment1: Sorrow came to visit us today. Was the longest day, was the loneliest day. Sorrow came to steal our hope away. Only tears can tell. Of this holy hour
english.segment2: This mountain's high, too high for us. This mountain's high, too high for us
english.segment3: Sorrow came quicker than a fire. Was the longest day, was the loneliest day. I feel your hand, the warmth, your sweetest smile. But you slipped away, through the great divide
english.segment4: This mountain's high, too high for us. This mountain's high, too high for us
english.segment5: Your ways are high, too high for us. Your ways are high, too high for us
